# Radio buttons

```{r radio-buttons}
radioButtons(inputId = "ratio1",
              label = "Please choose one",
              choices = list("A", "B", "C")
)
```


Radio button value:

```{r print-radio-input, echo=FALSE}
renderPrint(input$ratio1)
```
